Package grendel.view

Interface Summary
FolderView Implements a view on a storage folder; this shows all the messages currently stored in a folder.
MessageSetView Represents a view on messages.
MessageSetViewObserver Anyone who wants to know when messages are added, removed, or tweaked in a MessageSetView can implement this and add themselves to that MessageSetView's list of observers.
ViewedFolder  
ViewedMessage This is a message in a MessageSetView.
ViewedStore  
ViewedStoreListener  
 

Class Summary
FolderViewFactory Factory to create a new FolderView object, viewing the given Folder.
ViewedStoreBase  
ViewedStoreEvent
